instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01521 image crackle on external
threads.message:
Good afternoon, this Mac suffered oxidation in region 7655, 8FHXTW and conector FPC LCD, where components were missing, I performed the replacement, in tests the Mac takes a while to present image, and after a while the image is distorted, cracked.

PPBUS 12.65V

threads.title: 820-01521 image crackle on external
threads.message:
Do you mean corrosion around Q7065?
Does it charge and works with battery alone?

Internal LCD image is good, only has external video problems?

threads.title: 820-01521 image crackle on external
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 73526, member: 682"]
Do you mean corrosion around Q7065?
[/QUOTE]
yes.

It turns on only when the battery is connected.

The display does not show an image, as it has been shorted on the LCD connector, PDM_DMIC_DATA0_ISOL, PDM_DMIC_CLK0 and SMC_LID_LEFT.

threads.title: 820-01521 image crackle on external
threads.message:
Pretty hopeless project.
Damaged LCD connector by liquid is almost sure bad CPU.
iGPU eDP outputs directly connected to J8500.
